original: mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi /

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro //

original: dga' bo / ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tshom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang /
analyzed: dga bo ngas mdo di chad ba ni bsod nams zhan ba dang ma dad ba dang lta ba log ba dang the tshom za ba dang mtshams med ba byed ba dang tshe thung ba dang sems can dmyal ba dang

original: byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do //
analyzed: byol gro dang gshin rje jig rten dang mtshams med ba gro ba sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs di chad do

original: dga' bo / phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga bo phyi ma dus phyi ma tshe khyim na gnas ba dang dge slong las phal cher gzungs di mi klog ba dang mchod ba mi byed ba rnams ji ltar khyim ba rnams sdug sngal ba chad ba de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug sngal ba gyur ro

original: de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ste de bzhin du sangs rgya mchod cing di la nyan ba mchod rten gcig byed na chos kyis rgyan ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod ba gyur ro

original: gzhan yang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpog tu med ba gyur ro

original: sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du @504b byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdong pos rgyan ba bklags shing kha ton du byed ba gyur ro

original: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: jig rten dang jig rten las da ba dkyil khor du yang jug ba gyur ro

original: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po rgyan bum las thu ba bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so
